DOC.brief_summary: This randomize , single-dose , open-label , two-period crossover study 16 healthy subject . The study consist two phase : Pre-randomization Randomization . The Pre-randomization phase two period : Screening Baseline . In Randomization Phase , subject randomize one two possible treatment sequence ( fed/fasted fasted/fed ) . In period , subject receive single capsule contain 10 mg lenvatinib either without standard breakfast . There 2-week washout treatment .
DOC.brief_title: E7080 Food Effect Study Healthy Subjects
